member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute
member.summary: 扩展自Sirenix.OdinInspector.InfoBoxAttribute 优化中文字体的显示 使用方法和Sirenix.OdinInspector.InfoBoxAttribute一样

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.Message
member.summary: The message to display in the info box.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.InfoMessageType
member.summary: The type of the message box.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.VisibleIf
member.summary: Optional member field, property or function to show and hide the info box.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.GUIAlwaysEnabled
member.summary: When true the InfoBox will ignore the GUI.enable flag and always draw as enabled.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.IconColor
member.summary: Supports a variety of color formats, including named colors (e.g. "red", "orange", "green", "blue"), hex codes (e.g. "#FF0000" and "#FF0000FF"), and RGBA (e.g. "RGBA(1,1,1,1)") or RGB (e.g. "RGB(1,1,1)"), including Odin attribute expressions (e.g "@this.MyColor"). Here are the available named colors: black, blue, clear, cyan, gray, green, grey, magenta, orange, purple, red, transparent, transparentBlack, transparentWhite, white, yellow, lightblue, lightcyan, lightgray, lightgreen, lightgrey, lightmagenta, lightorange, lightpurple, lightred, lightyellow, darkblue, darkcyan, darkgray, darkgreen, darkgrey, darkmagenta, darkorange, darkpurple, darkred, darkyellow.

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.Icon
member.summary: The icon to be displayed next to the message.

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.#ctor(System.String,Sirenix.OdinInspector.InfoMessageType,System.String)
member.summary: Displays an info box above the property.
member.param: The message for the message box. Supports referencing a member string field, property or method by using $.
The type of the message box.
Name of member bool to show or hide the message box.

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Displays an info box above the property.
member.param: The message for the message box. Supports referencing a member string field, property or method by using $.
Name of member bool to show or hide the message box.

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.InfoBoxExAttribute.#ctor(System.String,Sirenix.OdinInspector.SdfIconType,System.String)
member.summary: Displays an info box above the property.
member.param: The message for the message box. Supports referencing a member string field, property or method by using $.
The icon to be displayed next to the message.
Name of member bool to show or hide the message box.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleExAttribute.Title
member.summary: The title displayed above the property in the inspector.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleExAttribute.Subtitle
member.summary: Optional subtitle.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleExAttribute.BoldTitle
member.summary: If true the title will be displayed with a bold font.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not to draw a horizontal line below the title.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleExAttribute.TitleAlignment
member.summary: Title alignment.

member.summary: Creates a title above any property in the inspector.
member.param: The title displayed above the property in the inspector.

member.summary: Optional subtitle.

member.summary: Title alignment.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not to draw a horizontal line below the title.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleGroupExAttribute.BoldTitle
member.summary: If true the title will be displayed with a bold font.

member.name: F:EasyFramework.ToolKit.TitleGroupExAttribute.Indent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not to indent all group members.

member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolManager
member.summary: 对象池管理器接口，负责管理多个对象池的创建和访问

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolManager.TryCreatePool(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: 尝试创建对象池
member.param: 对象池中存储的对象类型
member.returns: true 表示创建成功；false 表示已存在同名同类型的池

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolManager.TryGetPool(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: 尝试获取指定名称和类型的对象池
member.param: 对象池中存储的对象类型
member.returns: 找到的对象池，如果不存在则返回null

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IUnityObjectPoolManager.TryCreatePool(System.String,System.Type,UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: 尝试创建对象池。
member.returns: true 表示创建成功；false 表示已存在同名同类型的池。

member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool
member.summary: 对象池接口，定义了对象池的基本操作和属性

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool.Name
member.summary: 对象池的名称

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool.ObjectType
member.summary: 对象池中存储的对象类型

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool.Capacity
member.summary: 对象池的容量上限

member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension
member.summary: 对象池扩展方法类，提供了一系列便捷的对象池操作方法

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.OnRent``1(``0,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: 添加对象生成时的回调函数
member.param: 对象生成时的回调函数
member.returns: 对象池实例，支持链式调用

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.OnRelease``1(``0,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: 添加对象回收时的回调函数
member.param: 对象回收时的回调函数
member.returns: 对象池实例，支持链式调用

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.SetCapacity``1(``0,System.Int32)
member.summary: 设置对象池的容量
member.returns: 对象池实例，支持链式调用

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.TryRent``1(EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool)
member.summary: 尝试从对象池中获取指定类型的对象
member.exception: 当期望的类型与对象池中的对象类型不兼容时抛出

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.Release(EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool,System.Object)
member.summary: 从对象池中释放一个实例。如果释放失败，则抛出异常。

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPoolExtension.Remove(EasyFramework.ToolKit.IObjectPool,System.Object)
member.summary: 从对象池中移除一个实例。如果移除失败，则抛出异常。

member.summary: 对象池中对象的原始预制体

member.summary: 对象池的Transform组件，用于管理池中对象的层级关系

member.summary: 更新对象池状态，处理对象生命周期和回收
member.param: 距离上次更新的时间间隔（秒）

member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.ObjectPool
member.summary: 通用对象池实现，用于管理实现了IPooledObject接口的对象

member.name: T:EasyFramework.ToolKit.ObjectPoolBase
member.summary: 对象池的基类，实现了IObjectPool接口的基本功能

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.ObjectPoolBase.Name
member.summary: 对象池的名称

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.ObjectPoolBase.ObjectType
member.summary: 对象池中存储的对象类型

summary.para: 对象池的容量上限。设置小于0表示无限制
当设置新的容量时，如果新容量小于当前活跃对象数量，将抛出异常。

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.ObjectPoolBase.ShrinkAvailableObjectsToFitCapacity(System.Int32)
member.summary: 根据容量限制收缩

member.summary: 对象池中对象的原始预制体

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.UnityObjectPool.TickInterval
member.summary: 更新间隔

member.name: P:EasyFramework.ToolKit.UnityObjectPool.DefaultAddComponentType

summary.para: 对象池中对象默认添加的组件类型
如果为null代表不添加默认组件

member.exception: 当value不为空，并且不是Component的子类或者是抽象类、接口时抛出

member.name: M:EasyFramework.ToolKit.UnityObjectPool.OnTick(System.Single)
member.summary: 定时更新所有活跃对象的状态

summary.para: 匹配时会先判断返回的Type数组长度是否与参数数量相同，然后逐个参数匹配是否符合，如果有Type为null代表不限制该参数的类型。
